Author: kindbear_kindbud
Text: I developed acid reflux bc it's a common side effect of a med I used to be on. And it just stuck around. Any combination of too much citrus/acid/spice makes me feel barfy and stomachachey.

Author: aquaticmollusc
Text: I do, I was still in post op recovery for an upper endo and they told me I had a hernia and a fuckload of erosion all over my stomach. They have me taking pills for it. Never ever stop taking them. I had to wait a week once and that was enough to fuck up all the healing i had managed to do. Fuck stomachs, we can live without em.
